hero.title: Excursion Studio - Courses
hero.description: This series of tutorials is designed for robotics students. Currently covering the field of Probabilistic Robotics, including Convex Optimization, Differential Geometry, and Stochastic Processes. More courses in related fields will be added in the future.

items.title: Convex Optimization
items.text: Starting from the basic concepts of convex sets and convex functions, this course provides in-depth coverage of convex optimization theory, multi-objective optimization, and manifold optimization, with emphasis on their applications in robot path planning, control, and decision-making.
topics: Convex Optimization Problems and Duality Theory

items.title: Differential Geometry
items.text: From topological foundations to differentiable manifolds, systematically learn differential geometry theory, and gain deep understanding of Lie groups and Lie algebras and their applications in robot kinematics and dynamics modeling.

items.title: Stochastic Process
items.text: From probability theory foundations to stochastic process theory, master Markov processes and filtering algorithms, and learn how to perform robot state estimation and decision-making under uncertainty.
